底比斯.title: Thebes
底比斯.content: Ancient Greek city-state in Boeotia, famous for its seven gates and the tragic stories of Oedipus and his descendants.

忒拜.title: Thebes
忒拜.content: Ancient Greek city-state in Boeotia, famous for its seven gates and the tragic stories of Oedipus and his descendants.

Polynices.title: Polynices
Polynices.content: Son of Oedipus, brother of Eteocles. He led the Seven Against Thebes in an attempt to claim his rightful throne.

Eteocles.title: Eteocles
Eteocles.content: Son of Oedipus, brother of Polynices. He refused to give up the throne of Thebes, leading to the fraternal war.

阿革诺尔.title: Agenor
阿革诺尔.content: 腓尼基国王，欧罗巴与卡德摩斯之父。

俄狄浦斯.title: Oedipus
俄狄浦斯.content: 底比斯国王，拉伊俄斯与约卡斯塔之子。他因无意中应验了弑父娶母的预言而闻名

安菲翁.title: Amphion
安菲翁.content: 安菲翁，宙斯和安提俄珀之子，他与孪生兄弟泽托斯共同创建并建造了底比斯城墙。

阿塔玛斯.title: Athamas
阿塔玛斯.content: 阿塔玛斯是希腊神话中波俄提亚地区的国王，风神埃俄罗斯与爱神埃纳瑞忒之子。

提尔山脉.title: Tyrian
提尔山脉.content: 位于底比斯附近的山脉，位于今黎巴嫩南部和以色列北部沿海。

波俄提亚.title: Boeotia
波俄提亚.content: 古希腊的一个地区，底比斯城邦的所在地。
